content:
Kole swims multiple laps at the pool every day during the summer.

They recorded the number of laps they swam and how long (in minutes) their swimming session lasted for five days this week.
  
|||||
:-- | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --: | --:
**Laps** | $17$ | $13$ | $20$ | $15$ | $16$
**Time (min)** | $32$ | $23$ | $35$ | $25$ | $28$ 
  
**Plot the data in a scatterplot.**
